cocktails.title: Alaska Cocktail
cocktails.description: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Alabama Slammer
cocktails.description: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass.

cocktails.title: After Dinner Cocktail
cocktails.description: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice.

cocktails.title: Bourbon Sling
cocktails.description: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon.

cocktails.title: Negroni
cocktails.description: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
